onlyListOwnerCanEditAttributes: Only list owner can edit list attributes
noItemsToDelete: There is no items to delete
onlyListOwnerCanDelete: Only list owner can delete users
nicknameRules: Nickname length must be at least 6 symbols and contain only letters, numbers, underscores and dots
passwordRules: Password must be at least 8 symbols and contain letters and numbers
mustAcceptPP: You must accept our privacy policy
welcome: Make the step towards convinient shopping!
inputCard: Input name of the card and data
sameCard: This card is the same as old
name: Name
sameList: This list is the same as old
page1Content: Collaborate seamlessly with friends and family on shopping lists that update in real-time.
page2Content: Store and access all your discount cards with a simple scan, ensuring you never miss out on savings.
page3Content: Add products effortlessly using your voice for a hands-free shopping experience.
page4Content: Simple and user-friendly interface allows us to bring seamless experience for our users.
success: Email received! Promo code on the way when Shopper goes premium. Stay tuned! ðŸ“¬ðŸŒŸ
paywallTitle: Shopper is gearing up for a subscription model
paywallContent: Secure a Special Discount! Leave your email now for uninterrupted access when the paywall arrives. Act fast
addNewListDesc: To add new list tap the 'Plus' button in the corner of lists tab. Then input name of the list and choose icon with swipe gesture.
removeList: Remove list or quit from list
removeListDesc: To remove or to quit from list swipe it to the left and press opened button.
updateListDesc: To update list long tap on it and change the values.
addNewListItemDesc: To add new list item tap the 'Plus' button in the corner of list tab. Then input name of the product and optionally input volume.
addWithVoiceTabDesc: To add items with voic tap the 'Microphone' button on the bottom of list tab.
removeListItemDesc: To remove list item swipe it to the left and press opened button.
markUnmarkItemDesc: To mark/unmark list item swipe it to the right and press opened button.
clearListDesc: To clear list tap the 'Trash' button on the bottom of list tab.
addPeopleDesc: To add people to the list press 'Users' button on the top of list tab.
andRememberDesc: All changes are made in realtime. You don't need to reload the list to see updates.
addNewCardDesc: To add new card tap the 'Card' button in the corner of cards tab. Then input name of the card, it's numbers (or scan it) and choose icon with swipe gesture.
scanCardDesc: While creating or editing card You can scan card to add it's numbers automatically. Just press 'Card' button in value text field.
removeCardDesc: To remove card swipe it to the left and press opened button.
updateCardDesc: To update card long tap on it and change the values.
addNewUserDesc: To add user to list tap the 'Plus' button in the corner of users tab. Then input nickname of the person You want to add.
removeUserDesc: To remove user from the list swipe it to the left and press opened button.
addItemsWithVoiceDesc: To start press 'Microphone' button one time. To finish - press again. After You finish items will be displayed in dialog. If You are satisfied with result press 'Add all' to add items.
voiceRulesDesc: To add with voice You have to follow pattern. Optionally You say volume of product followed by 'OF' then name of the product and finish with 'NEXT'. That's the pattern for one item.
removeVoiceItemDesc: If You don't like how the item was recognized You can remove it by swiping left and pressing opened button.
contactUs: Contact us by this email to request deletion of Your full infromation. Make sure to add Your nickname and email for current account.
tapEmailToCopy: Tap email address to copy it.
reportBugDesc: Please, contact us by this email to report a bug. In the message describe the bug and attach Your nickname, email and app version.
criticalUpdate: Update is critical. To continue using the app, please update it in
emailMustBeRegistered: Email must be registered in app
emailIsUsedInCampaign: Email was already registered in promo campaign
confirmYourAccountDesc: Copy numbers below and paste them inside field in Your Shopper app.
messageWithCodeWasSent: Message with confirmation code was sent to Your email. Check spam folder in case there is no new emails.
newPasswordDesc: Input new password in the field below
passwordCantBeTheSameAsOld: New password should be different from the old one
paywallText: Enjoy unlimited functions for free during our development period! Invite Your friends and family to get the best experience!
